title: description
Justin Timberlake's Barton Special: A bad variant of the Barton Special. As our as Justin Timberlake's dreams.

title: notes
Justin Timberlake's Barton Special: Calvados, Apple and a hint of fall.

title: pairing
Justin Timberlake's Barton Special: Justin Timberlake has it with an older Boiled Rice and stollen.

title: serving_suggestion
Justin Timberlake's Barton Special: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Drink to the crazy sounds of Not A Bad Thing.
